title: "£3.5 million for start-up giving robots a human touch"
excerpt: "A Scottish start-up at the Higgs Centre for Innovation, has raised £3.5 million to give robots a sense of a touch. Scottish start-up Touchlab, has raised £3.5 million ($4.8 million) in seed funding to develop an electronic skin for robots."
